name: OpenDyslexic_font
title: OpenDyslexic Font
author: CosmicWolf
description:
Changes the game to work with the OpenDyslexic, a dyslexic friendly font.
Thank you asher_sky for the more fonts mod I used as a base for this one.

For all the fellow dyswhatevers to help find the mod:
dislexic, opendislexic, disletic, opendisletic, dyslexic, opendyslexic, dysletic, opendysletic, dyscalculia, disability
